1//
2// Created by tibo on 17/01/18.
3//
4
5#include <iostream>
6
7#include <libdecklink/device.hpp>
8#include <libdecklink/types.hpp>
9
10#include "handle_errors.hpp"
11
12using std::to_string;
13using namespace DeckLink;
14
15const int max_name_len = 35;
16const int max_result_len = 13;
17
18void show_help() {
19 std:: cout << "deckstatus device-name\n"
20 << "\n"
21 << "Show the status information of the specified BlackMagic DeckLink video capture card.\n"
22 << " \n";
23}
24
25void show_status(
26 const std::string& name,
27 const std::string& value,
28 const std::string& description = ""
29) {
30 std::cout << " - "
31 << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right << name << ": "
32 << std::setw(max_result_len) << std::left << value;
33
34 if (!description.empty())
35 std::cout << " (" << description << ")";
36
37 std::cout << "\n";
38}
39
40int main(int argc, char** argv) {
41 if (argc != 2) { show_help(); return -1; }
42
43 try {
44
45 std::string device_name{argv[1]};
46 if ((device_name == "--list") or (device_name == "-l")) {
47 const auto devices = Device::List();
48
49 std::cout << "Listing detected devices:\n";
50 for (const auto& device: devices) {
51 std::cout << " - " << device.get_display_name()
52 << " ( " << device.get_vendor_name()
53 << " " << device.get_model_name() << " )\n";
54 }
55 return 0;
56 }
57
58 auto has_device = Device::Get(device_name);
59 if (!has_device) {
60 std::cerr << "Error: Unable to locate device named: " << device_name << ".\n";
61 return -1;
62 }
63
64 auto& device = *has_device;
65
66 std::cout << device.get_long_name() << " status: \n";
67
68 const auto busy_state = device.get_int_status(StatusID::BusyState);
69 if (busy_state) {
70 const auto busy_state_value = static_cast<BusyState>(*busy_state);
71 const std::string desc = BusyState_::get_description(busy_state_value);
72 show_status("Busy State", to_string(busy_state_value), desc);
73
74 }
75 else {
76 std::cout << " - Busy state: Unknown\n";
77 }
78
79 const auto duplex_mode = device.get_int_status(StatusID::DuplexMode);
80 if (duplex_mode) {
81 const auto duplex_mode_value = static_cast<DuplexMode>(*duplex_mode);
82 const std::string desc = DuplexMode_::get_description(duplex_mode_value);
83 show_status("Duplex Mode", to_string(duplex_mode_value), desc);
84 }
85 else {
86 std::cout << " - Duplex mode: Unknown\n";
87 }
88
89 const auto video_signal_locked = device.get_bool_status(StatusID::VideoInputSignalLocked);
90 if (video_signal_locked) {
91 show_status("Input video signal locked", (*video_signal_locked ? "Yes" : "No"));
92 }
93 else {
94 std::cout << " - Input video signal locked: Unknown\n";
95 }
96
97 const auto ref_signal_locked = device.get_bool_status(StatusID::ReferenceSignalLocked);
98 if (ref_signal_locked) {
99 show_status("Reference signal locked", (ref_signal_locked ? "Yes" : "No"));
100 }
101 else {
102 std::cout << " - Reference signal locked: Unknown\n";
103 }
104
105 std::cout << " -\n";
106 const auto current_input_video_mode = device.get_int_status(StatusID::CurrentVideoInputMode);
107 if (current_input_video_mode) {
108 const auto current_input_video_mode_value =
109 static_cast<ImageFormat>(*current_input_video_mode);
110 const std::string name = ImageFormat_::pretty_print(current_input_video_mode_value);
111 show_status("Current input video image format", name);
112 }
113 else {
114 std::cout << " - Current input video image format: Unknown\n";
115 }
116
117 const auto current_input_video_flags = device.get_int_status(StatusID::CurrentVideoInputFlags);
118 if (current_input_video_flags) {
119 const BitMask<DeckLink::VideoInputFlags> current_input_video_flags_value(*current_input_video_flags);
120
121 std::cout << " - " << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right
122 << "Current Video Input Flags" << ": ";
123
124 bool first_flag = true;
125 for (const auto flag: DeckLink::VideoInputFlags_::Values) {
126 if ( !(current_input_video_flags_value & flag) )
127 continue;
128
129 if (!first_flag) {
130 std::cout << " - " << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right << "" << ": ";
131 }
132
133 std::cout << std::setw(max_result_len) << std::left << to_string(flag);
134 first_flag = false;
135 }
136
137 // No flags were set
138 if (first_flag) std::cout << "\n";
139
140 }
141 else {
142 std::cout << " - Current input video flags: Unknown\n";
143 }
144
145 const auto current_input_video_px_fmt =
146 device.get_int_status(StatusID::CurrentVideoInputPixelFormat);
147 if (current_input_video_px_fmt) {
148 const auto current_input_video_px_fmt_value =
149 static_cast<PixelFormat>(*current_input_video_px_fmt);
150 const std::string name = to_string(current_input_video_px_fmt_value);
151 show_status("Current input video pixel format",
152 PixelFormat_::pretty_print(current_input_video_px_fmt_value));
153 }
154 else {
155 std::cout << " - Current input video pixel format: Unknown\n";
156 }
157
158 std::cout << " -\n";
159 const auto
160 detected_input_video_mode = device.get_int_status(StatusID::DetectedVideoInputMode);
161 if (duplex_mode) {
162 const auto detected_input_video_mode_value =
163 static_cast<ImageFormat>(*detected_input_video_mode);
164 const std::string name = ImageFormat_::pretty_print(detected_input_video_mode_value);
165 show_status("Detected input video image format", name);
166 }
167 else {
168 std::cout << " - Detected input video image format: Unknown\n";
169 }
170
171 const auto
172 detected_input_video_flags = device.get_int_status(StatusID::DetectedVideoInputFlags);
173 if (detected_input_video_flags) {
174 const BitMask<DeckLink::VideoInputFlags> detected_input_video_flags_value(*detected_input_video_flags);
175
176 std::cout << " - " << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right
177 << "Detected Video Input Flags" << ": ";
178
179 bool first_flag = true;
180 for (const auto flag: DeckLink::VideoInputFlags_::Values) {
181 if ( !(detected_input_video_flags_value & flag) )
182 continue;
183
184 if (!first_flag) {
185 std::cout << " - " << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right << "" << ": ";
186 }
187
188 std::cout << std::setw(max_result_len) << std::left << to_string(flag);
189 first_flag = false;
190 }
191
192 // No flags were set
193 if (first_flag) std::cout << "\n";
194 }
195 else {
196 std::cout << " - Detected input video flags: Unknown\n";
197 }
198
199 std::cout << " -\n";
200 const auto
201 current_output_video_mode = device.get_int_status(StatusID::CurrentVideoOutputMode);
202 if (current_output_video_mode) {
203 const auto current_output_video_mode_value =
204 static_cast<ImageFormat>(*current_output_video_mode);
205 const std::string name = ImageFormat_::pretty_print(current_output_video_mode_value);
206 show_status("Current output video image format", name);
207 }
208 else {
209 std::cout << " - Current output video image format: Unknown\n";
210 }
211
212 const auto
213 current_output_video_flags = device.get_int_status(StatusID::CurrentVideoOutputFlags);
214 if (current_output_video_flags) {
215 const BitMask<DeckLink::VideoOutputFlags> current_output_video_flags_value(*current_output_video_flags);
216
217 std::cout << " - " << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right
218 << "Current output video flags: ";
219
220 bool first_flag = true;
221 for (const auto flag: DeckLink::VideoOutputFlags_::Values) {
222 if ( !(current_output_video_flags_value & flag) )
223 continue;
224
225 if (!first_flag) {
226 std::cout << " - " << std::setw(max_name_len) << std::right << "" << ": ";
227 }
228
229 std::cout << std::setw(max_result_len) << std::left << to_string(flag);
230 first_flag = false;
231 }
232
233 // No flags were set
234 if (first_flag) std::cout << "\n";
235 }
236 else {
237 std::cout << " - Current output video flags: Unknown\n";
238 }
239
240 const auto current_output_video_px_fmt =
241 device.get_int_status(StatusID::LastVideoOutputPixelFormat);
242 if (current_output_video_px_fmt) {
243 const auto current_output_video_px_fmt_value =
244 static_cast<PixelFormat>(*current_output_video_px_fmt);
245 const std::string name = to_string(current_output_video_px_fmt_value);
246 show_status("Last output video pixel format",
247 PixelFormat_::pretty_print(current_output_video_px_fmt_value));
248 }
249 else {
250 std::cout << " - Last output video pixel format: Unknown\n";
251 }
252
253 } catch (const DeckLink::decklink_driver_error &ex) {
254 print_driver_error_details(ex);
255
256 } catch (const DeckLink::runtime_error& ex) {
257 std::cout << "\n"
258 << "An error occurred! \n"
259 << boost::diagnostic_information(ex) << "\n";
260 }
261
262 return 0;
263}
